name: Instructions Unclear
description:
This game is just here to make you appear clever in front of your friends (if you have some).

The rules are dead simple but as there is no explanation it's confusing.

The red icon appearing on the right is the checking model the next click will use.

  Absolute position : Use the two white icons to click on the right cell

Column position : Use the first white icon to click on the correct column

Row position : Use the second white icon to click on the correct row

  Blink : Just click on the blinking cell

The white icons refers to a position (x for left icon, y for right icon) from 1 to 22 :

  1. A : Apple
  2. B : Books
  3. C : Car
  4. D : Dog
  5. E : Earth
  6. F : Flower
  7. G : Gift
  8. H : House
  9. I : Image
  10. J : Journal
  11. K : Key
  12. L : Love
  13. M : Money
  14. N : Network
  15. O : Oil
  16. P : Phone
  17. Q : QR-Code
  18. R : Road
  19. S : Star
  20. T : Time
  21. U : University
  22. V : Volume

The colors on the grid means absolutely nothing, you can use them to invent stupidly complicated rules to your friends so you can look even more clever.
